original_text: Whenever Moses went out to the tent, all the people would rise up, and each would stand at his tent door, and watch Moses until he had gone into the tent.
korean_text: 모세가 회막으로 나아갈 때에는 백성이 다 일어나 자기 장막 문에 서서 모세가 회막에 들어가기까지 바라보며

sentences.original_text: Whenever Moses went out to the tent
all the people would rise up
and each would stand at his tent door
and watch Moses until he had gone into the tent
sentences.korean_translation: 모세가 장막에 들어갈 때까지 그를 지켜보았다
